alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor; Flat Tops; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 9:59PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A line of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Garfield and south central Rio Blanco Counties through 1030 PM MDT... At 959 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorms 9 miles north of Parachute, or 41 miles west of Glenwood Springs, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Garfield and south central Rio Blanco Counties, including the following locations... Rio Blanco. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 84 and 86. Colorado 13 between mile markers 8 and 25. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor; Flat Tops; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus
